channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee -- McAfee Web Gateway (MWG)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee -- McAfee Web Gateway (MWG)

item.title: CVE-2020-7295|2024-08-04T09:25:48.950Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20web%20gateway%20%28mwg%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) prior to 9.2.1 allows authenticated user interface user to delete or download protected log data via improper access controls in the user interface.

item.title: CVE-2020-7293|2024-08-04T09:25:48.986Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20web%20gateway%20%28mwg%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) prior to 9.2.1 allows authenticated user interface user with low permissions to change the system's root password via improper access controls in the user interface.

item.title: CVE-2020-7294|2024-08-04T09:25:48.869Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20web%20gateway%20%28mwg%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) prior to 9.2.1 allows authenticated user interface user to delete or download protected files via improper access controls in the REST interface.

item.title: CVE-2020-7296|2024-08-04T09:25:48.991Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20web%20gateway%20%28mwg%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) prior to 9.2.1 allows authenticated user interface user to access protected configuration files via improper access control in the user interface.

item.title: CVE-2020-7292|2024-08-04T09:25:48.627Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20web%20gateway%20%28mwg%29
item.description: Inappropriate Encoding for output context vulnerability in McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) prior to 9.2.1 allows a remote attacker to cause MWG to return an ambiguous redirect response via getting a user to click on a malicious URL.

item.title: CVE-2020-7297|2024-08-04T09:25:48.996Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20web%20gateway%20%28mwg%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) prior to 9.2.1 allows authenticated user interface user to access protected dashboard data via improper access control in the user interface.
